page.title: Business & Commercial Banking
page.tab:
At Hong Leong Bank, we are specialized in providing business loans to company, corporate, small and medium enterprises (SME). Our increasing presence in the region enables us to serve our customers with secure and flexible lending facilities at very competitive rates. Whether you need a loan for business expansion or for working capital purposes, Hong Leong Bank will be the bank of choice to meet your business requirements. Our products include:

  • Overdraft
  • Term Loan

Overdraft

Overdraft is a convenient and flexible form of financing with no fixed repayment schedule. You can draw on funds as and when you require, and the interest is only charged on the amount that is drawn. The purpose of Overdraft is to meet you business’s working capital requirements.

Overdraft Facility

  • Short term revolving lending facility
  • No fixed repayment schedule
  • Flexibility to draw on funds as and when required

Term Loan

Term Loan is a credit facility for a specific tenor and for a specific purpose. It is usually utilized to finance the purchase of capital goods and immovable properties and buildings for business operations. The tenor is usually fixed to meet the business’s short/ long term financing requirements.

Term Loan Facility

  • Short and medium to long term lending facility
  • Term of up to 10 years is available
  • Fixed monthly repayment over the loan term
